00002 /*! _zgematrix+zssmatrix operator */
00003 inline _zgematrix operator+(const _zgematrix& matA, const zssmatrix& matB)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator+(const _zgematrix&, const zssmatrix&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if(matA.M!=matB.M || matA.N!=matB.N){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(const _zgematrix&, const zssmatrix&)"
00013               << std::endl
00014               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00015               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00016               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00017     exit(1);
00018   }
00019 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00020   
00021   for(long c=0; c<matB.VOL; c++){
00022     matA(matB.Indx[c],matB.Jndx[c]) += matB.Array[c];
00023   }
00024   
00025   return matA;
00026 }

00029 /*! _zgematrix-zssmatrix operator */
00030 inline _zgematrix operator-(const _zgematrix& matA, const zssmatrix& matB)
00031 {
00032 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00033   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator-(const _zgematrix&, const zssmatrix&)"
00034             << std::endl;
00035 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00036   
00037 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00038   if(matA.M!=matB.M || matA.N!=matB.N){
00039     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator-(const _zgematrix&, const zssmatrix&)"
00040               << std::endl
00041               << "These two matrises can not make a subtraction." << std::endl
00042               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") - ("
00043               << matB.N << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00044     exit(1);
00045   }
00046 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00047   
00048   //// change sign ////
00049   for(long i=0; i<matA.M*matA.N; i++){
00050     matA.Array[i]=-matA.Array[i];
00051   }
00052   
00053   //// add ////
00054   for(long c=0; c<matB.VOL; c++){
00055     matA(matB.Indx[c],matB.Jndx[c]) += matB.Array[c];
00056   }
00057   
00058   return matA;
00059 }

00061 //=============================================================================
00062 /*! _zgematrix*zssmatrix operator */
00063 inline _zgematrix operator*(const _zgematrix& matA, const zssmatrix& matB)
00064 {
00065 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00066   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const _zgematrix&, const zssmatrix&)"
00067             << std::endl;
00068 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00069   
00070 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00071   if(matA.N!=matB.M){
00072     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator*(const _zgematrix&, const zssmatrix&)"
00073               << std::endl
00074               << "These two matrises can not make a product." << std::endl
00075               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") * ("
00076               << matB.N << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00077     exit(1);
00078   }
00079 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00080   
00081   zgematrix newmat(matA.M, matB.N);
00082   newmat.zero();
00083   
00084   for(long c=0; c<matB.VOL; c++){
00085     for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00086       newmat(i,matB.Jndx[c]) += matA(i,matB.Indx[c])*matB.Array[c];
00087     }
00088   }
00089   
00090   matA.destroy();
00091   return _(newmat);
00092 }
